pingball.simulation

Class GridLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • pingball.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>
      • pingball.simulation.GridLocation

  • public class GridLocation
extends Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>
    A grid location on the board. This is a lightweight wrapper around Pair. Rep-Invariant: None. The pair of integer can be anything within Integer range.
